title: Nothing Else Matters
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Do I love you?
Let me tell ya
My Mona Lisa with a smile
Knowing all that we've been through together
We have lasted for a while
[Pre-Chorus]
Hasn't it been so easy
But life can be that way
You made all the mountains seem so small
[Chorus]
'Cause when there's love, true love
Nothing else matters at all
[Verse 2]
Those precious moments
Are filled with so much tears and laughter
Funny how the time does fly
Was it all a plan or some passing chances?
I won't ask the reason why
[Pre-Chorus]
If I say I love you
Let me tell it like it is
Love you 'til the stars
All start to fall

[Chorus]
'Cause when there's love, true love
Nothing else matters at all
[Pre-Chorus]
When I say I love you
Let me tell it like it is
Love you 'til the stars
All start to fall
[Outro]
Yes, when there's love, love
Oh, when there's love, love
Yes, when there's love, true love
Nothing else matters
Nothing else matters
Nothing else matters at all
Nothing else matters at all
